text: Boltyansky, Boltyanski or Boltyanskii (Russian: Болтянский) is a Russian masculine surname; its feminine counterpart is Boltyanskaya. It may refer to *Natella Boltyanskaya (born 1965), Russian journalist, singer-songwriter, poet and radio host *Vladimir Boltyansky (1925–2019), Russian mathematician Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Boltyansky
